page.title: 12The clergy
page.content: community, and congregations are small, usually between 12 and 20. The Rector, Rev. G.A. Chesterman lives in Mugginton Rectory near the top of Tag Hole Lane. He is assisted by Rev. P. Simpkin who is a non-stipendiary priest, with a full-time job at Rolls-Royce, and Mrs. D. Simpkin, deaconess. The church is run by the Parochial Church Council which meets 5 or 6 times a year, and considers such matters as repairs and renovations, finance, patterns of worship and any matter pertaining to the work of the church in the Parish.
